casebody.data:
BLUE RIDGE HOMES, INC., and RICHARD CARVALHO, Plaintiffs and Appellees, v. RONALD J. THEIN, RACHEL THEIN, and FIRST SECURITY BANK, Defendants and Appellants. No. DA 07-0267. Submitted on Briefs March 12, 2008. Decided May 29, 2008. 2008 MT 188.

343 Mont. 500.

_P.3d_.

Opinion withdrawn by Supreme Court and reissued on July 29, 2008. The reissued opinion is now cited at 345 Mont. 125.
